inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of high-grade malignant glioma confirmed by central neuropathological review
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient aged 3 years and older but under 18 years at time of relapse diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent of the patient (mandatory from 15 years of age) or the parents (mandatory till 18 years of age)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelets < 100 000/µl (< 100 Gpt/l) PT, INR and PTT above normal range Absulute neutrophil count ≤ 1 500/µl (< 1,5 Gpt/l)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin < 10g/dl (< 6,4 mmol/L) Serum creatinine ≥ 1,5 x upper limit of normal range or creatinine clearance rate ≤ 60 ml/min/m2 (corrected for body surface area)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin ≥ 1,5 x upper limit of normal range SGOT (ASAT) and SGPT (ALAT) ≥ 2,5 x upper limit of normal range Alkaline phosphatase ≥ 2,5 x upper limit of normal range
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ongoing irradiation or chemotherapy (within the last 4 weeks)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Estimated life expectancy of less than 2 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity or contraindication to any study drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current or recent (within 30 days prior to start of trial treatment) treatment with another investigational drug or participation in another investigational trial
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment. They have a life expectancy of less than 2 months.
